title: Maurice Buckley
text:
I heard Thomas talk about Evolution Lawyers at a TNG meeting I was impressed with what he said and asked him to assist me with a serious bankruptcy matter, I gave him all of the information he quickly got to grips with the situation, represented me in the High Court, he then skillfully negotiated with the other party and achieved an amazing settlement, which has now been concluded
I cannot recommend highly enough and will be referring clients in the future
